body: she's not even actually saber, but that's getting into heavy spoiler territory

@Outlaw_Christian She isnt the real saber from the stay night series or the pan human history. She's from the sixth lostbelt chapter where instead being chosen to drawn the caliburn she instead was found on a boat when she was a baby marking her as the child of prophecy to overthrown morgan iirc
